original: intros l1 l2 b Hnth Hl1. induction b. - apply I. - simpl in *. apply interp_ext with (l2 := l2); auto. - simpl in *. specialize (IHb1 Hl1). specialize (IHb2 Hl1). tauto. - simpl in *. apply H. apply interp_ext with (l2 := l2); auto. - simpl in *. apply ex_derive_Rn_ext. intro n. rewrite map_ext; auto. intros. apply interp_ext with (l2 := l2); auto. - simpl in *. split. ++ apply IHb1. destruct Hl1 as [Hc1 Hc2]. split. ** intros n. destruct (ssrnat.eqn n n0); auto. destruct (ssrnat.eqn n n1); auto. rewrite !Hnth. auto. ** apply interp_ext with (l2 := l2); auto. ++ intros u v Huv. apply IHb2. destruct Hl1 as [Hc1 Hc2]. split. ** intros n. destruct (ssrnat.eqn n n0); auto. destruct (ssrnat.eqn n n1); auto. rewrite !Hnth. auto. ** apply interp_ext with (l2 := l2); auto.
